name: Lunalight Silver Hound
effectText: If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Lunalight" monster from your Deck, except "Lunalight Silver Hound", but you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except "Lunalight" monsters, while you control that face-up monster. When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can banish this card and 1 "Lunalight" Fusion Monster from your GY; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Lunalight Silver Hound" once per turn.
